Rainy_Day_0: Morning precious. Be careful in the mud today yeah?$0#$b#I will be too.$1
Rainy_Day_1: A nice rain always freshens the forage.$1
Rainy_Day_2: How'd you sleep precious?$0#$e#Me? I had weird dreams...$4
Rainy_Day_3: Morning. I couldn't sleep so I woke up early and made some soup.$2#$b#It's been simmering for a while so it should be tasty.$0[236]
Rainy_Day_4: Yeah, I'll make sure not to track too much mud into the house.$2#$e#Again...$4
Rainy_Night_0: I think I finally got all the mud out of my shoes...$4#$b#The river's swollen with all this rain so things got... interesting...$1
Rainy_Night_2: I got a new botany book to tuck into tonight.$1#$e#I'd um- like to curl up with you on the couch and read-$4#$e#If you'd like...$6
Rainy_Night_3: I spent my afternoon in the forest hunting mushrooms.$1#$e#And my evening scrubbing the floors...$4
Rainy_Night_4: I spent all afternoon on this so I hope you like it.$1#$b#Also, we need more bandages.$4
Rainy_Night_5: We should have a date-night soon. The rain makes me feel lonely.$4
Indoor_Day_0: Hey there precious. Having a good day?$1
Indoor_Day_2: I think I'm gonna catch up on some reading today.$1
Indoor_Day_3: If you see any interesting flora... would you bring me a sample?$0
Indoor_Day_4: I need to repair some shirts...$4#$e#Maybe I should head over to stoffton...$1
Indoor_Night_0: Did you have a good day precious?$1
Indoor_Night_2: I'm gonna read up on phylums before bed.$1
Indoor_Night_3: Precious! I just finished this facinating chapter on the flora of ginger island!$1#$b#There's a mushroom called a 'magma cap' hat has un-paralleled healing capabilities!0#$b#However, no one has come up with a way to augment this ability and store it in, say, a handy potion-like substance.$4#$b#However, I suppose one wouldn't need to...$2#$e#Food for thought.$0
Indoor_Night_4: Hello precious. Would you like some tea?$0#$e#I'd have to make another pot, I'm afraid I've already drank this one.$2#$b#And a few others... I'm probably over-caffienated.$1
Outdoor_0: Good morning precious! Isn't the morning air lovely?$1
Outdoor_2: I thought I'd get a jump-start on my forageing today.$1
Outdoor_3: This wind is troubling. I'll be sure to stay away from cliffs.$2
Outdoor_4: Do you need anything from town? I'm gonna go out later.$1
OneKid_0: Have you seen %kid1 lately?$2#$e#I dropped a flora sample that may-or-may not be poisonous.$4
OneKid_1: Keeping the mud at bay is a lot harder now that we have %kid1.$2#$e#Not that they're the main offender...$6
OneKid_3: I made %kid1 some coloring pages of the local flora.$1#$b#It's never too early to learn about foraging!$0
TwoKids_1: I'm so excited to see how %kid1 and %kid2 grow up.$1
TwoKids_2: I never really thought about haaving kids until you.$1#$b#But I like this.$6
TwoKids_3: Precious, if I'm gonna take the kids out foraging again, we're gonna need more bandages.$2#$e#No- No! The kids are fine...$4
Good_1: Hello precious. I'm so happy to see you.$1
Good_2: I'm thinking about making a risotto for dinner.$1
Good_6: You're precious to me, er- precious.$6
Neutral_0: We should go on a date soon. I feel like I haven't seen you in ages.$2
Bad_1: This was never the life I thought I'd have...$4
Bad_2: If I did something wrong, you'd tell me right?$7
Bad_3: You're on your own for supper, dear.$7
Bad_4: Something's wrong. I don't know why but I'm anxious all the time.$4
Bad_5: Look, I think I'll go to bed early tonight.$2#$e#You can do whatever.$7
Bad_6: I don't feel great tonight. I'd like to be alone.$7
funLeave_Emily: Bye precious! I'll be back soon ok?$1
funReturn_Emily: Hello precious! I'm gonna go make an order for some new shirts.$8
spring_2: If you see any leeks out there I could use some.$1
spring_1: Spring means a new selection of things to forage!$1
spring_22: Summer is coming up. I always like to see what new flora is growing.$1
summer_20: I found a beautiful shell on the beach today. I think I'll use it as a serving platter for tonights dinner.$0
summer_2: Do you have any spiceberries? I dreampt you had spiceberries.$1
fall_25: Winter is coming, I will miss mushroom season greatly.$4
winter_15: I lost my coat.$10#$b#And I need some more shirts.$11
winter_5: I brushed off some fresh snowpants for today!$1#$b#I don't want hypothermia again...$4
winter_2: Be careful out there in the cold. Frostbite sucks.$2
spring_Maru: I'm gonna do some cooking with horseradish today.$1#$e#Yes, I'll remember to vent the house out after.$2
fall_Emily: Fall makes me want pie.$1#$e#But mushrooms don't make the best option...$4
summer_Emily: I'm gonna buy some fresh veggies today.$1
winter_Emily: Can we turn up the heat precious?$1#$e#My hair got crispy after my shower...$4
spouseRoom_Emily: I'm gonna do some reading today.$1
